header: OpenFisca makes law computable. It is a free and open-source computation engine that allows modelling tax and benefit systems in a collaborative and transparent way. This software is used by researchers and public agencies.
stats: {explorerLink} of {countryPackageName} tax and benefit system model.
explorerText: Explore the {variablesCount, number} variables and {parametersCount, number} parameters
api: {apiLink} that lets you compute them from any app.
forEternity: which is the eternity. Its value is constant over time
noFormulaParagraph: It does not have a formula and therefore is {formulaNotComputable}. It can only be used as an input for a computation.
thisVariableJson: Get the JSON for this variable
checkChangelog: Check the spelling of the requested URL. If this link used to work and doesn't anymore, check the {changelogURLLink}.
notParamNotVariable: '{inputValueRef}' is neither a parameter nor a variable in OpenFisca.
explore: Explore OpenFisca's parameter and variable database
